jade.core.persistence
Interface PersistenceHelper

All Superinterfaces:
jade.core.ServiceHelper
public interface PersistenceHelper
extends jade.core.ServiceHelper

The vertical interface for the JADE kernel-level service managing saving and retrieving agents and containers to persistent storage.

Author:
Giovanni Rimassa - FRAMeTech s.r.l., Giovanni Caire - TILAB

Field Summary
static java.lang.String DELETE_AGENT
          This command name represents the delete-agent action, requested by an entity external from the agent to be loaded.
static java.lang.String DELETE_AGENT_GROUP
          This command name represents the delete-agent-group action, requested by an entity external from the agent group to be deleted.
static java.lang.String DELETE_CONTAINER
          This command name represents the delete-container action.
static java.lang.String FREEZE_AGENT
          This command name represents the freeze-agent action, requested by an entity external from the agent to be frozen.
static java.lang.String FREEZE_MYSELF
          This commmand name represents the freeze-myself action, requested by the agent that wants to be frozen in a persistent store.

          This command name represents the get-frozen-agents action.

static java.lang.String LOAD_CONTAINER
          This command name represents the load-container action.
static java.lang.String LOAD_FROM
          The name of a persistence-specific profile parameter, stating which repository to load the current container from.
static java.lang.String META_DB
          The name of a persistence-specific profile parameter, stating the URL from where the properties for the JADE meta-database can be retrieved.
static java.lang.String NAME
          The name of this service.
static java.lang.String RELOAD_AGENT
          This command name represents the reload-agent action, requested by an entity external from the agent to be reloaded.
static java.lang.String RELOAD_MYSELF
          This command name represents the reload-myself action, requested by the agent that wants to restore its state to a previously saved one.
static java.lang.String SAVE_AGENT
          This command name represents the save-agent action, requested by an entity external from the agent to be saved.

          This command name represents the save-container action.
static java.lang.String SAVE_MYSELF
          This command name represents the save-myself action, requested by the agent that is to be saved.
static java.lang.String THAW_AGENT
          This command name represents the thaw-agent action.

registerSavable

void registerSavable(Savable s)
Register a Savable object whose methods will be called-back each time the agent associated to this PersistenceHelper is involved in some persistence related operations (e.g. save, freeze ....)

save

void save(java.lang.String repository)
Make the agent associated to this PersistenceHelper be saved on the indicated repository. It should be noted that this method just changes the agent state to AP_SAVING. The actual save operation takes place asynchronously.

saveMyself

void saveMyself(jade.core.AID agentID,
                java.lang.String repository)
                throws jade.core.ServiceException,
                       jade.core.NotFoundException,
                       jade.core.IMTPException
Deprecated. Use save() instead

Throws:
jade.core.ServiceException
jade.core.NotFoundException
jade.core.IMTPException

reload

void reload(java.lang.String repository)
Make the agent associated to this PersistenceHelper be reloaded from the indicated repository. It should be noted that this method just changes the agent state to AP_RELOADING. The actual reload operation takes place asynchronously.

reloadMyself

void reloadMyself(jade.core.AID agentID,
                  java.lang.String repository)
                  throws jade.core.ServiceException,
                         jade.core.IMTPException,
                         jade.core.NotFoundException
Deprecated. Use reload() instead

Throws:
jade.core.ServiceException
jade.core.IMTPException
jade.core.NotFoundException

freeze

void freeze(java.lang.String repository,
            jade.core.ContainerID bufferContainer)
Make the agent associated to this PersistenceHelper be freezed on the indicated repository. It should be noted that this method just changes the agent state to AP_FROZEN. The actual freeze operation takes place asynchronously.

freezeMyself

void freezeMyself(jade.core.AID agentID,
                  java.lang.String repository,
                  jade.core.ContainerID bufferContainer)
                  throws jade.core.ServiceException,
                         jade.core.IMTPException,
